JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Cloud Engineer: Build Scalable SaaS Solutions for a Global Market
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
At HR-ON, we are looking for a passionate AWS DevOps Specialist to design, optimize, and drive robust cloud solutions for our global HR SaaS platform. Your Role

As a Senior Cloud Engineer at HR-ON, you will be a pivotal figure in shaping the development and scalability of our serverless HR platform. Your expertise will drive critical decisions and implementations, ensuring robust, secure, and high-performing SaaS solution in a global market.

Key responsibilities include:
  • Architecting, implementing, and maintaining scalable AWS cloud infrastructure, leveraging services like Lambda, S3, RDS, and CloudFormation.
  • Building and refining CI/CD pipelines for seamless, secure, and efficient software deployment.
  • Leading the development of backend functionality in Node.js and TypeScript.
  • Monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimizing system performance with AWS CloudWatch and advanced monitoring tools.
  • Driving strategic architectural decisions to future-proof scalability, security, and reliability.
  • Automating complex operational workflows to improve system efficiency and developer productivity.
Who Are You?

You’ll thrive in this role if you are:

  • A team player who enjoys working closely with colleagues across disciplines to solve challenges together.
  • Flexible and adaptable, thriving in a dynamic environment where priorities may shift.
  • Proactive and solutions-oriented, always looking for ways to optimize processes and improve outcomes.
  • Can communicate and explain complex concepts in an accessible way to both technical and non-technical colleagues.
Preferred Qualifications:
  • Expertise in building APIs with GraphQL or REST.
  • Advanced knowledge of Linux/Mac shell scripting (Bash, Zsh).
  • Familiarity with AWS monitoring tools.

You have professional experience with AWS and thrive on taking ownership, solving complex challenges, and working collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.


What We Offer

At HR-ON, senior developers like you are empowered to shape both the technology stack and the development culture. Here’s what you can expect:

  • Influence: Take the lead on key decisions impacting architecture and workflows.
  • Flexibility: Enjoy the freedom to work remotely or from our centrally located office in Odense.
  • Collaboration: Be part of a highly skilled, creative, and supportive team.
  • Growth: Access opportunities to expand your technical expertise and grow with the company.
About HR-ON

HR-ON is an ambitious, values-driven tech company headquartered in Odense, with offices in Jutland, Zealand, Germany, and Japan. We develop a cutting-edge HR SaaS solution, empowering businesses worldwide to optimize recruitment and employee development.

At HR-ON, you’ll enjoy a balance of deep technical challenges and team-oriented activities, from solving complex backend problems to brainstorming innovative ideas over a ping pong match. We value diversity, innovation, and ownership—and we’re looking for someone ready to make a lasting impact.
